biography: Pandurangrao Bhimrao Desai (1910–1974) was an Indian epigraphist, historian, and archaeologist.
aiSummary: P. B. Desai is a medicine specialist with an H-index of 65 at Oncology leadership (Member). Has been published in Nature. Based in Unknown, Unknown, Global.
